title: Host-design strategies of zinc anodes for aqueous zinc-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23023-23036
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04353G, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xuanyu Zhou, Tingting Ruan, Jie Xu, Chenhao Li, Shixuan Huang, Jianping Zhou, Shengli Lu, Rensheng Song, Ruhong Li
Host-design optimization strategies for zinc anode are systematically summarized. Reasonable structural regulation can control interfacial mass transfer, uniform zinc nucleation, and regulate crystal growth, thereby stabilizing the zinc anode.
